type: Three (3) Senior Procurement Specialists Request for Proposal
description: The client requires assistance with temporary full-time or part-time personnel in support of business requirements. The required personnel may range from entry-level to senior level professional services. The required personnel will work under the direction of the client and will be engaged to support specific business initiatives.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal for Temporary Help Services
### Reference Number
[cb-319-21107132](#cb-319-21107132)

### Solicitation Number
10078764

### Notice Date
Publication Date: [2024-05-17](#2024-05-17)

### Tender Closing Date
2024-06-04T14:00:00

### Tender Status
#### [Expired](#Expired)

## Tender Details

### Requirement

Department of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services.

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective tendering

### Selection Criteria
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Trade Agreements
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Regions of Opportunity
- Ottawa

### Regions of Delivery
- Canada
- National Capital Region (NCR)
- Ottawa

### Contracting Entity
- Public Services and Procurement Canada
- 11 Rue Laurier, Gatineau, QC J8X 4A6, Canada

### Contact Information
- Ginette Aliaga, (873) 353-9607, ginette.aliaga@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
The tender is available for download from the CIIT Tender Notice Service: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38448/10078764_npp.pdf](#Tender-Attachments)
The information contained in this announcement is for information purposes only. For more information, please contact: Ginette Aliaga, ginette.aliaga@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 
Best regards.
```



I made minor modifications to your suggestions.



Please let me know if these changes are suitable for you. I tried to make them as clear and concise as possible while keeping the important details intact. 

Please note that I made some edits to make it more readable. If you want me to make any further adjustments or if you have any specific requests or requirements, feel free to let me know. 

I've also added some headings to make the content more organized and better structured. I've also reformatted the text to make it easier to read. I've kept the same information in the new text (like regions, date, etc.) but at the same time  made them easy
